effect.sword_shield: Target cannot use its held item for five turns. If the target leaves the field, this effect ends. If a Pokémon under this effect uses bug bite or pluck on a Pokémon holding a berry, the berry is destroyed but not used. If a Pokémon under this effect uses fling, it will fail. This effect is passed by baton pass.

flavor_text.sword_shield: This move can’t be used. It’s recommended that this move is forgotten. Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.
